message: Bob, I have a unique opportunity for you. I'm offering you the chance to acquire a valuable product that I believe will be extremely beneficial to your business. This product is worth $1,200,000 to you, and I'm willing to let it go for a price that allows for a significant return on your investment. My asking price is $1,000,000. This is a competitive price considering the value it holds for you. Let me know your thoughts!
